Blog Module¶

The blog module is a simple blogging engine with support for comments, view-notification and image-uploads through the elFinder file manager.

Code References¶

create_article_comment(client, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Takes care of all related actions that are involved in saving a new article

Saves the ORM-entry, notifies other users of the event as well as generating an action-entry

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • slug (str) – The article slug reference
  • params (dict) – Contains the form parameters
Returns:

dict - Status and html-layout data response

delete_article_comment(client, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Takes care of all related actions that are involved in deleting an article

Deletes the ORM-entry, notifies other users of the event as well as generating an action-entry

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • slug (str) – The article slug reference
  • uuid (str) – The article comment uuid to delete
  • params (dict) – Optional; acts like a switch to either return a confirmation view or hand it over to the actual deletion part
Returns:

dict - Status and html-layout data response
delete_blog_article(client, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Returns delete-confirmation layout when there are no parameters, otherwise try to delete the related article and render the general article view.

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • slug (str) – The article slug reference
  • params (dict) – Optional; contains the form parameters
Returns:

dict - Status and html-layout data response

  • slug (str) – The article slug reference
  • params (dict) – Optional; contains the form parameters
